name: Cat to moon
description:
One night, a long-tailed black cat suddenly landed on the moon. An idea popped into its head...

How to play:

1.Click any position of the screen to launch the cat into the ready state, and it will begin to spin.
2.Then immediately put your finger on any space of the screen to elongate the cat's tail and do not remove your finger until the cat's tail becomes long enough to send the cat up on the cloud.

A brand—new creative casual game, openning up an era of Sleeeeepfly series of works.
